bibl.seg: Robinson Damian and Andrew Wilson (Edd.), Alexandria and the North-Western Delta. Joint Conference Proceedings of Alexandria: City and Harbour (Oxford 2004) and The Trade and Topography of Egypt's North-West Delta, 8th century BC to 8th century AD (Berlin 2006). (Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology. Monograph 5.)
Oxford, University of Oxford, School of Archaeology, 2010, 4°, xviii-282 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-1-905905-14-0. £45.

Pp. xi-xviii, 2 figg. coul.: D.R. and A.W., Introduction. - Alexandria and the North-Western Delta: 10 contributions. - Studies in the Material Culture of the North-Western Delta and Submerged Settlements in Aboukir Bay: 13 contributions.
